comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.myarnolds.com/individual.php?pid=I15794&ged=Arnol... which mentions children with these names suggests he spelled his last name with a "K" Albert Ludlow Kramer, 1878-1948 Albert Ludlow Kramer, Jr. born Mar 24, 1907 Martha Leighton Kramer, born Oct 4, 1911 His wife, mother of the children is listed as Anna Bement, 1880-1931.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.oldlongisland.com/2010/07/picket-farm.html is a house he built on Long Island not long after this photo. It looks as though he married again as several books (about finding God) were written by Albert Ludlow Kramer and Alice Bishop Kramer, between 1936 and 1941.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: His second wife was photographed by Arnold Genthe in 1932 www.loc.gov/pictures/item/agc1996013108/PP/ www.loc.gov/pictures/item/agc1996013107/PP/

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thank you for the info. on Kramer and family.  We'll  include some of it next time we update.
